website_summaries.verdict: STEM learning comes to life in this 40-piece electronics project kit.
pros: Comes with 40 pieces to build lamps, switches, electrodes, and similar projects
Patented safety devices to prevent injury

customer_reviews.title: ... as a gift to a 9 yr old and loved it! In this generation when all they play ...
customer_reviews.text: Gave this as a gift to a 9 yr old and loved it! In this generation when all they play is the ipad, it's refreshing to see kids tinkering and figuring out stuff like this circuitry set. My 6 yr old has the jr set and loves it. Upgraded hers from sc 100 to 300. But when we saw this set, it doesn't have the same parts and projects as hers. This ones has a compass, magnet and magnetic powder to name a few. She loves playing with her jr snapcircuits so this particular set is also going on her wishlist! It's a great gift and toy!
customer_reviews.author: chicmommy14

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a 5yo girl just getting into electronics!
customer_reviews.text: Our 5 year old daughter surprised us at another kid’s birthday party by really liking an electricity set, so we thought we’d try this one out at home. She LOVES it. I like that the instructions are user friendly (even for a layman like me) and it is set up to explain in different methods (ie: written instructions, step-by-step, a diagram), so many different learning types would benefit from this set. Great purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Carly

customer_reviews.title: Hit of the party
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my 9 year old great nephew and he started playing with it immediately at his bday party. He had seen it before and was thrilled to have one. His mother had suggested only outdoor sports and toys but I am "that" Aunt - they all have way too many toys and I will only buy educational or books.
customer_reviews.author: WineLover

customer_reviews.title: These are great
customer_reviews.text: These are a great learning experience for people of ALL ages that are not familiar with electricity and circuits. Also I love that you can buy more kits and put them together if you want. The only reason I didn't give 5 stars is because the button style connections system is a little too tight IMO and kids have a hard time snapping them and can even end up breaking the plastic surface it all mounts on, otherwise, still a great toy/educational/learning tool.
customer_reviews.author: Danno

customer_reviews.title: Technical
customer_reviews.text: This is a great teacher for a child who is already technically inclined and our 8 year old was overwhelmed. It is quite technical and about the level what I studied in beginning electrical engineering. This is a great teaching instrument but it will take real motivation on the part of the child to spend the time to go through all the demonstrations and begin to understand basic electronics. I think it is a great device and has real learning potential especially compared to all the other toys etc available for children.
customer_reviews.author: Elsie Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: It is not like a Lego kit
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful teaching experience which requires a couple of hours each time for the adult and child to build. This was purchased for a 6 year-old who is smart, and can easily build things with legos. This toy is not about creativity. For a child of 6 who is looking for instant gratification, this toy isn’t the one to get. Instead of it being left at the child’s home, we have it at the grandparents’ home where Papa can spend the time to teach him about electricity.
customer_reviews.author: T. Alexander

customer_reviews.title: I’m Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Our 19 year old grandson was visiting for a week and after reading reviews decided to try the Exploration Set. I understand why they have gotten such positive reviews. His first comment after following directions and diagrams was “this is SO fun”. The best part was his grand dad who has engineering degree loved helping as he was thrilled with what it was teaching.
customer_reviews.author: Nana P

customer_reviews.title: Great! ... But...
customer_reviews.text: I opened it up today and tried it out. It worked great over all! However my volt meter does not work. I tried project 11 to specifically test it. The M5 meter will not read. The book is very comprehensive. I would not say it is kid as kid friendly as it advertises (age 8 and up) the book is more of a user manual. I would like to add that I appreciated the book including actual pictures with the drawings of exploratory projects.
customer_reviews.author: Allison

customer_reviews.title: Learning with fun
customer_reviews.text: Lots of very neat projects to stimulate the brain, it got my son interested and kept his interest going. May need adult assistance depending on age but is fun for adults too. Would recommend buying a separate tub or container for storing
customer_reviews.author: Jesse A.

customer_reviews.title: bought for an 11 year old
customer_reviews.text: bought for my my science loving adhd kid. I was surprised at how much he loved this and started playing with it right away. With in minutes he was doing experiments and created a pretty big project right away. then he got 4 video games for xmas and hasnt touched it again.......but im sure he will next time he gets his video game privileges taken away, this will for sure be his got to.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Stover

customer_reviews.title: Excellent.. as part of a physics class
customer_reviews.text: Excellent ..as part of a physics class..it breeds so much interest...a great teaching tool...well the only issue is how long it will last.
customer_reviews.author: glutch

customer_reviews.title: One broken piece within an hour of opening
customer_reviews.text: This toy is a fantastic concept and my boys have spent hours completely intrigued with making circuits. I don't regret buying it at all but one of the crucial pieces broke immediately. The little metal "snap" on one end of a blue connector broke right off and couldn't be snapped back into place. I looked up the company's website and found a very easy online form to order a free replacement of the defective part.
customer_reviews.author: Stu P Talene

customer_reviews.title: Good electronics toy.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this snap circuits set for my 5 year old nephew, who is more advanced than most 5 year olds. Have made several set ups with it and he is easily able to snap the circuits together and follow the diagrams (with help). The materials are reasonably sturdy and durable and everything works well. You do have to be careful to not lose the many pieces in the set or you may find yourself unable to complete one of the projects. Overall good, educational toy for kids that have some mechanical/science inclination and interests. Price is reasonable for the quality.
customer_reviews.author: ddm

customer_reviews.title: too hard to put pieces together
customer_reviews.text: frustrates my eleven-year old when he cannot get the pieces to go together. I like the idea, but pieces take too much strength to put together. It sits in the box as a "failed" gift.
customer_reviews.author: mardartx

customer_reviews.title: A unique gift for a curious child...
customer_reviews.text: This was one of a series of Holiday gifts sent automatically to my 11-year-old Grandson, and it's been a huge success. He enjoys receiving each new set, and his Mom (my daughter) tells me he immediately dives into each one and continues until it's completed. A great idea, and worth every penny...
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Pasquale

customer_reviews.title: She loved it and enjoys the challenge it presents
customer_reviews.text: It was present to our 12 yr old niece. She loved it and enjoys the challenge it presents.
customer_reviews.author: b0x

customer_reviews.title: All parts were present and working
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grand daughter really enjoyed creating with this set. The first thing she made did not work. So she trouble shot it and found one connection was not tight. Fixed it and all was good. She is looking forward to the next box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Must Buy!
customer_reviews.text: This is amazing to play with. It is perfect for kids and is very durable. It is so easy to take out and put in the box again. The book tells soooop many projects. This is one of the coolest stem projects I got from the prime stem subscription.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Arrived with broken piece
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this product, which was given as a Christmas gift but I was very sad that the “magnet” piece arrived broken. Since it was a gift we didn’t know this until after Christmas and can no longer return. My son loves what is left to work with but cannot do all the projects due to broken piece
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Gift for a Boy or Girl
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8 yr old nephew. He has the basic one which I gave him earlier. I hope this isn't redundant with the first. Snap Circuits are great fun and educational.
customer_reviews.author: ELC

customer_reviews.title: Making things Makes learning fun
customer_reviews.text: My 8 yr old grandson was elated to get his very own Snaptricity. He is looking forward to using it. They have these at his school so he was familiar with what all he could do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Southern sweet

customer_reviews.title: My son loves it. Well made.
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised with this product. It arrived in a stem mystery box for kids and my son loves it. It off all his Christmas gifts he may have pulled this out the most so far. He even brought it to show and tell one day.
customer_reviews.author: Nifty Ifty

customer_reviews.title: Great fun, we loved it.
customer_reviews.text: Amazing and fun, my 8yr old son loves it, but honestly, so do I. He played continuously for several days, this many weeks later he still asks to play with this set often.
customer_reviews.author: Ines Nathalia Nunez

customer_reviews.title: Great STEM toy for curious children
customer_reviews.text: My 3.5 year old loves this and after he worked the initial small and large setups with our nanny, he is able to make the simpler arrangements work by himself and thinks it’s awesome. Some pieces don’t seem to work but he’s entertained by the light, spinning wheel and speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sully823

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: My son got super interested in the snap circuits after using them in class, so I had to get him some for at home. High quality, easy to follow instructions, entertaining & educational
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Schad

customer_reviews.title: Received as a stem subscription item
customer_reviews.text: This is a great STEM toy. I got it as part of a subscription...unfortunately I already had it! But I can say it's a nice item and interesting to work with.
customer_reviews.author: Lexi NJ

customer_reviews.title: My 10 year old granddaughter loves this!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband to teach my granddaughter about circuits and electricity. They both love it. The are working their way through the book making all the projects. Money well spent!
customer_reviews.author: Cruisinthrulife!

customer_reviews.title: My teenagers loved this!!
customer_reviews.text: This is super easy to use, and the kids love them. Great for sleepovers or youth groups. Comes with good clear instructions, and suggestions for circuits in the book. Quite a large variety.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: 3 parts are missing in the kit. Good toy otherwise for 10 years old.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this snap circuits kit for my son as Christmas gift. When he opened it there are 3 parts missing in the box. After 10 days they mailed the missing parts to me. Now my son likes this toy. He is now making electric experiments everyday.
customer_reviews.author: H. L

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: We love Snap Circuits! My son was excited to get this additional set. He has several now.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: All my kids love!!
customer_reviews.text: We received this in our STEM subscription and love it. We had bought one in the past so I knew it would be a hit. I have 4 kids and all 4 love it. My 8 and 4 year old love assembling and my 3 and 1 year old have a blast watch it all work.
customer_reviews.author: Angelina

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, seven year old easily able to play with it
customer_reviews.text: Very well made. Great quality, well designed and thought out. Got this for my 7 year old and he (and daddy) have spent hours playing and learning in the three days he has had it. Money very well spent.
customer_reviews.author: D.T.

customer_reviews.title: Great gift idea
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my nephew. Snap circuits are so durable and a great learning gift that is a toy.
customer_reviews.author: Cammie2281

customer_reviews.title: My 4th-graders love this!
customer_reviews.text: I have twin boys in the 4th grade. I gave this to one of them for their 10th birthday in January. They love it! My husband (who has a physics degree) was impressed by it, too.
customer_reviews.author: TeamMed

customer_reviews.title: Not all kids are going to like this, but the ones that do will really like it.
customer_reviews.text: My 6 yr old grandson really took to it, but my 8 year old granddaughter could care less. I think there would enjoy it more if it did more then make a fan go. Perhaps a small radio or speaker and microphone. The unit is well made and the snap circuits go together easily, and it could be used to teach the math of circuits for the older children.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Our 6 year old loved it
customer_reviews.text: Our six year old boy loved this. He's spent a good amount of time with it. It's one of his favored toys. It's fun and educational. A child can put together working circuits from the circuit diagrams in the instruction manual without help from an adult. They also begin to learn some basic principles of electricity such as having to complete the circuit in order for it to work. Well worth the money. Would love to see more circuit components available for the series.
customer_reviews.author: Frank D Roosevelt

customer_reviews.title: Fun Learning About Electricity
customer_reviews.text: This has given my 10yr old son and 7yr old daughter hours of fun. We had a few other sets so this was a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Smoore

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this circuit set. They have been through the book at least once doing all of the experiments. It is great to see them working together and learning at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: L. Redding

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for science-minded kids
customer_reviews.text: Awesome awesome gift for kids interested in engineering, building, science projects. Great quiet activity.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gift
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it, he's six and it's easy and fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Daniels

customer_reviews.title: You want to have fun with your kids?!?!?
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome set. I wish we had these when i was growing up. I had to settle with blowing up the kitchen with the chemistry set! This teaches kids about circuits and it is so well made! Even my 4 year old niece loves hunting for the parts to help put them together! I am buying more of these kids. 5 stars. It would be 6 if it was allowed...
customer_reviews.author: Benji Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Challenging for a 7 year old but fun
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for a child who needs a little challenge and an interest in learning
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So much fun!
customer_reviews.text: Idk if I had more fun with it or of my daughter did! What an awesome "toy". It is challenging and rewarding and inspires you to keep playing with it. We love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Wuest

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: My kids love this set. It’s easier to put together than I anticipated. Everything just snaps on the board. It’s something they can do on their own There are lots of different pieces and ways to set it up.
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Working great and a lot of fun
customer_reviews.text: I bought this kit for my classroom and I had fun testing it out! The pieces in this kit seem to work well together and I am happy with how they are packaged. The manual is helpful and I think my students will learn a lot from this kit while also having fun!
customer_reviews.author: Lydia Hodges

customer_reviews.title: Full STEAM ahead!
customer_reviews.text: My 5 year old loves it! It comes with a book showing how to do everything and it is broken down page by page as a project to complete! You do not have to know anything about electricity to do this! Perfect gift to give and inspire the young mind!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Reynaga

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing! Missing Pieces...
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this as part of a subscription where my son gets a box per month. Because of the holidays being hectic, we're just getting around to opening this...well, it looks like the product was opened by someone else, pieces removed and we're unable to use it because we don't have the project book!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica R.

customer_reviews.title: More than a game!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this "game" -> it is more than a game because he is actually learning about current, circuits, etc. I even used it to check old batteries in the house using the meter to see how many were low voltage and could not be reused.
customer_reviews.author: mama2

customer_reviews.title: Christmas present
customer_reviews.text: Christmas present 🎁 have no idea how he is going to enjoy it
customer_reviews.author: dorothy aspegren

customer_reviews.title: Creative minds
customer_reviews.text: This is great for kids of all ages. It gets their minds thinking and creative on what they can make. Highly recommend it for your kids or gifts for kids.

customer_reviews.title: Motor skills
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a friend. Great for kids trying to learn / help with motor skills. Used at physical therapy on motor skills!

customer_reviews.title: Snap Circuits Kit
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it! Item was shipped timely and received exactly as described!

customer_reviews.title: STEM Building Kit
customer_reviews.text: The toy was a big hit at Xmas and it arrived in time. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: Good Gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my little sister as a gift last Christmas & she liked it a lot.

customer_reviews.title: Interesting....

Easy enough instructions for the kids to do this themselves. (Though it is fun to sit and help.) This does bring on a lot of questions about why and how things work, so we do a lot of research on the net to find answers. :)

customer_reviews.title: Appear as advertised

customer_reviews.title: Great stem toy (non LEGO option)
customer_reviews.text: What kid (5th grade) loves this product. He likes to share his creations and frequently asks me to join in. Kids who enjoy “building” toys like legos or mechanics will enjoy this.

product_meta.title: Snap Circuits Snaptricity, Electronics Exploration Kit (Stem Building), For Kids 8+
product_meta.description:
Style:Stem Building"Snaptricity teaches young engineers how electricity and magnetism work and how they are used to make each other. This STEM kit has over 40 parts that can create over 75 projects. It is a great introduction to electricity and magnets. Snap Circuits are the only educational circuit-building toys that use circuitsafe fuse technology, a patented safety device unique to Snap Circuits brand products. These stem building sets are perfect for young engineers 8+

requires 3 “AAA” batteries (not included).

snap circuit products were created to provide a fundamental, hands-on education in how electrical circuits work to run everyday devices. All parts mount on plastic modules that snap together with ease. Young engineers will have hours of educational fun learning about electronics and how to build circuits. The circuit safe patented safety device (unique to Snap Circuits branded products) makes learning circuitry safe.

snap circuits products have won many awards, including toy of the year (toty), Austria's best toys for kids, parent's Choice Recommended, good housekeeping's best toy, family choice, National Parenting publications awards (Nappa gold), children's choice, Dr. Toy (100 best children's products, 10 best educational products, Green toy company), the inaugural seriously STEM award & Kapi award.

snap circuits is endorsed by Educators worldwide and used in schools, libraries, museums, and stem programs."

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Following the same experiment pattern of other Snap Circuits kits, Snaptricity teaches you how electricity and magnetism work and how they can be used to make each other. Learn about magnetic fields, how the electricity in your home works, how switches control the electricity to the lights in your home, and how series and parallel circuits affect electricity. Snaptricity uses the same "snap" connectors of Snap Circuits to bring electricity and magnetism theories into the practical home.
feature_bullets: With snaptricity, young engineers can build over 75 projects.
This stem kit has over 40 parts, including; lamps, switches, fan compass, electrodes, and more!
These building sets are a great introduction in how electricity and magnets work.
Snap Circuits are the only educational circuit-building toys that use circuitsafe fuse technology, a patented safety device unique to Snap Circuits brand products.
Learn by doing. Perfect for ages 8+.
